g.text: Ingress In KUBERNETES
. Before Ingress People would have a virtual machine and on top of that VM
they would configure a load balancer.
. But after Services came into the picture, it offered much more easy way to
configure load balancers.
. But their were problems using the services at Enterprice level.
Problems With Services:-
. Enterprice and TLS Load Balancing
. We have to create service for each micro-service
and cloud providers will charge for each service we create
so its costly.
Load Balancer
Virtual Machine
App 1
App 2
App 3
App 4
Features of Load balaning without using service
. Sticky Load balancing
. Path Based Loading Bln
. Host Load Bln
. TLS load Bln
This Features were missing in
services.
How Ingress Solves the Problem?
. After this was major issues in Kubernetes for specially people
who where migrating from VM to Kubernetes.
. Kubernetes Came up with the concept of "INGRESS".
. So in the market thier were many Enterprice Level Load Balancers
like nignix, F5, HA etc. So it was nearly impossible for kubernetes to
write logic for intigrating all of the load balancers into kubernetes cluster.
. So what kubernetes did was that, they asked these load blancers to write the
logic for something called "INGRESS CONTROLLER". Which had the logic to
intigrate Thier load balancer into kubernetes cluster.
Ingress Controller and Ingress Rescource.
. Ingress Controller is something that is Given by the load balancer we
are using.
. Suppose we are using Nginix Load Balancer than to use its features in our
kubernetes cluster we have to use thier Ingress Controller.
. Ingress controller have the all the logic for load balancing.
Ingress Controller:-
. Ingress resource is something we write as yaml file.
. In ingress resource yaml file we define what type of load balancing,
its method, count etc.
. Its just like specifying what we need the load balancer to do.
Ingress Resource:-
